lenstronomy.Extensions.SimulationAPI package¶

Submodules¶

lenstronomy.Extensions.SimulationAPI.multiband module¶

class lenstronomy.Extensions.SimulationAPI.multiband.MultiBand[source]¶

Bases: object

class to handle multi-band simulations this class splits joint parameters in multi-bands (e.g. lens model) and different ones (e.g. colour, image qualities)

add_band(name, collector_area, numPix, deltaPix, readout_noise, sky_brightness, extinction, exposure_time, psf_type='gaussian', fwhm=1.0, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • name – string, name of exposure e.g. DES-Y_band
  • numPix – number of pixels to simulate
  • deltaPix – pixel size
  • exposure_time – exposure time
  • sigma_bkg – background noise, assumed to be independent of exposure time
  • flux_calibration_factor – factor to scale the flux in the image based on relative throughput and efficiency of the telescope and instrument
  • psf_type – type of point-spread function
  • fwhm – full width at half maximum of PSF
  • args –
  • kwargs –
Returns:
del_band(name)[source]¶

delete exposure with the name indicated :param name: string, name of exposure :return:

image_name(idex)[source]¶
Parameters:idex – index of band
Returns:string, image name

Parameters:
  • kwargs_options –
  • kwargs_lens –
  • kwargs_source –
  • kwargs_lens_light –
  • kwargs_else –
  • no_noise –
Returns:

lenstronomy.Extensions.SimulationAPI.simulations module¶

class lenstronomy.Extensions.SimulationAPI.simulations.Simulation[source]¶

Bases: object

simulation class that querries the major class of lenstronomy

data_configure(numPix, deltaPix, exposure_time, sigma_bkg)[source]¶
Parameters:
  • numPix – number of pixel (numPix x numPix)
  • deltaPix – pixel size
  • exposure_time – exposure time
  • sigma_bkg – background noise (Gaussian sigma)
Returns:
fermat_potential(kwargs_options, kwargs_lens, kwargs_else)[source]¶

computes the Fermat potential :param kwargs_options: :param kwargs_lens: :param kwargs_else: :param no_noise: :return: array of Fermat potential for all image positions (in ordering of kwargs_else[‘ra_pos’])

im_sim(kwargs_options, kwargs_data, kwargs_psf, kwargs_lens, kwargs_source, kwargs_lens_light, kwargs_else, no_noise=False)[source]¶

simulate image with solving for the point sources, if option choosen :param kwargs_options: :param kwargs_data: :param kwargs_psf: :param kwargs_lens: :param kwargs_source: :param kwargs_lens_light: :param kwargs_else: :return:

normalize_flux(kwargs_options, kwargs_source, kwargs_lens_light, kwargs_else, norm_factor_source=1, norm_factor_lens_light=1, norm_factor_point_source=1.0)[source]¶

multiplies the surface brightness amplitudes with a norm_factor aim: mimic different telescopes photon collection area or colours for different imaging bands :param kwargs_source: :param kwargs_lens_light: :param norm_factor: :return:

normalize_flux_source(kwargs_options, kwargs_source, norm_factor_source)[source]¶

normalized the flux of the source :param kwargs_options: :param kwargs_source: :param norm_factor_source: :return:
